HomePage.title: Sovereign Finance for Real People
HomePage.subtitle: SOZU CAPITAL
HomePage.description: Building the financial OS for sovereign entrepreneurs — empowering communities to access credit, savings, and payments without banks.

credit.title: Sozu Credit
credit.subtitle: Credit built on trust — not paperwork
credit.description: Access credit through community vouching. No KYC required. Interest rates and credit amounts scale with your trust score. Good behavior unlocks bigger funds. Transparent requirements, no traditional credit checks.

wallet.title: Sozu Wallet
wallet.subtitle: Sovereign finance, seamless UX
wallet.description: Stellar-powered self-custodial wallets with Passkey authentication. Designed for non-crypto users with zero friction. Your keys, your funds, your sovereignty. Privacy-first, trust-driven, globally interoperable.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: From donation to empowerment
howItWorks.description: Donors fund micro-credit batches. Funds flow into on-chain Sozu Vaults generating DeFi yield (10-15% APY). Yield supports trust-based credit lines for verified entrepreneurs. Every transaction visible through TRUFA Proof of Allocation.

entrepreneurs.title: For Entrepreneurs
entrepreneurs.subtitle: Access credit without banks
entrepreneurs.description: Create a wallet instantly with no ID upload. Receive credit, track repayments, and build your Trust Score. Manage finances privately and self-custodially. Withdraw or pay through MercadoPago or any local anchor.
